description:
Lately, a mountain of vegetables has arrived at Kitaro`s door nearly every day. Kitaro and Daddy Eyeball are suspicious, wondering who could be behind it, but when Cat-girl shows up she says they`re just vegetables so they might as well accept them. The truth is, they`re vegetables that Cat-girl grew in an unused field she borrowed. One day, she finds a boy collapsed on the side of the road and gives him the vegetables she meant to give Kitaro. Meanwhile, Mana hears from her mother that cunning yokai have appeared near the vacation house Mana is visiting...!?
Source: crunchyroll
